reviewText: I loved it!!!! As far as I know, you're the only ones with this documentaries. I learned so much!!!!

This film is not really about alchemy, it is more of a diatribe against anyone who is not a Protestant Christian (including Jews, the state of Israel and Catholics, among others). The end quality of this film is so disheartening to the point that constructive criticism would be an absolute waste of time. It is clear the film makers are not very bright and so ideologically calcified that any real inquiry they make into reality is thwarted by their disdain and judgement of other religions and points of view. I have seen this happen to people all my life; too much Bible reading can reduce your knowledge and wisdom, and narrow your scope,  while increasing your haughtiness and sense of superiority. Not a good combination. And the piano music sucks.
Great information to share with those that care and even those that don't. Scary stuff. My best to the producers.
Gonz Shimura has an expansive ministry for Christ, and his ideas are crystallized in this "Age of Deceit" series. Don't miss the first video: Age of Deceit: Fallen Angels and the New World Order

A little down-tone and mechanised, like a depression assembly line in which I am supposed to stand numbly and waiting for the next installment, watchable, great effects and great craftsmsnship of the material, but so down tone its like, cmon man
A great video to get the latest info on what is going on in the world today.  It gives you so many sources.
Did you ever wonder, what is going on in the world, and why things are getting more bizarre every day. Watch this video to answer your questions.

Gonzo has put alot of work and research into his documentary. We were impressed with the amount of facts and interviews. Gonzo is able to connect dot's that I had never thought of before. We are fans now!
Pretty good. Gives you a lot to think about.
The truth the blind refuse to acknowledge.
Pure Christian Right Wing Fundamentalism at its most dangerous.
